description:
I have just installed it, created a document and now I cant Save it ! 
I HATE THIS PACKET
Whish it could save files as PDF
It is perhaps the best open source mind mapping software around. It is feature rich and highly customizable with scripting support for easily implementing custom functionality.

Firs, a contradiction: This is a powerful software with many ways to interact with it, and the keyboard cetric interface is a plus. But, it's burdened by a painful workflow process and an unintuitive interface.

For example, when you use it, you will find that you are spending a lot of time adjusting settings and property boxes, etc. This interferes with the flow of ideas capture and ideas set down. One of the central idea of mindmapping is the kinesthetic aspect of creating a mindmap. Modern computer mindmapping software has pretty much removed this important element and it does not need to be replaced by painful workflow. This software introduces too many distractions with too many feature settings for feature sake. It still lacks easy, intutitive visual interface adjustments. I doubt that the developers will be able to revert to a more intuitive tool, but they should realize that the more they expand the software for feature sake, the more they get away from what mindmapping central idea is. Capturing the quick flow of ideas can not be spent adjusting settings in a PC application. I am pretty sure Tony Buzan will agree with that.

jm
Très efficace, rempli de raccourci clavier, une alternative solide à Xmind
summary: Une superbe app de mind mapping
